page.title: 12Thorney Ghosts,Part 2
page.content: There is a{ghost}in{Bedford}Hall.It is in the upstairs room. It is reputed to be that of a man who fell through the roof and broke his neck. One day a boy called Kevin went to the{Bedford Hall}with his dad. They unlocked the door and went inside. They went up the stairs and past doors. They eventually came to a door and went in. They looked around and heard a noise and a record- player was turned on.They went down stairs, shut the door and heard some scratching noises so they went back home bewildered. At{Elder House Farm}when the horse keepers used to go to feed the livestock at 5am they always found a light on. One morning they decided to go to see if they could find out what was happening.{Daisy the cow}had decided she would turn the light on!
